response.answer_text: A ton of things, depending on the context. In general, it’s the mechanical sound of something engaging or connecting, like the click of a connector, the click of a switch, or the click of a turning wheel against an actuator. It may be the act of mentally or emotionally connecting with someone, understanding them quickly and at a highly compatible level. This is an analogy to the sure connection associated with a physical connection sound. click - Wiktionary A click (klick) is also a military slang for a kilometer.

The word is “clique”. It is a French word, and means a close and closed group - not open to admitting others. It may be an ethnic group. Or, a close knit group of teenagers who “hang out together” all the time. A gang. Possibly a group speaking a minority language might form a tight knit “clique”.
